content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position: -9.5, -0.5) - working and producing water
- Boiler (position: -5.0, 2.5) - currently out of fuel
- Steam engine (position: 0.5, 6.5) - not connected to power network, no input liquid
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam
- Small electric poles for power distribution
- System is experiencing fuel issues and connection problems

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting at Position(15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: 15.5, 70.5) - not receiving electricity
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position: 15.5, 72.5) - contains 680 iron ore
- Burner inserter to move ore from chest to belt (position: 15.5, 73.5) - working
- Transport belt system (positions: 15.5, 74.5, 16.5, 73.5, 16.5, 74.5, 17.5, 74.5) connecting to furnace area - contains 8 iron ore
- Burner inserter to move iron ore from belt to furnace (position: 17.5, 73.5) - working
- Stone furnace (position: 19.0, 73.0) - fueled with coal and working, currently smelting iron ore
- Burner inserter for output (position: 20.5, 73.5) - working
- Wooden chest for iron plates (position: 21.5, 73.5) - currently empty (plates being moved out)
- Burner inserter to move iron plates to belt (position: 22.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items, output blocked
- Transport belt connecting to circuit assembler - contains 54 iron plates
- Currently producing 19 iron plates per minute

### Copper Ore Mining and Smelting at Position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: -46.5, 70.5) - not receiving electricity
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position: -46.5, 72.5) - contains 742 copper ore
- Burner inserter to move ore from chest to belt (position: -46.5, 73.5) - working
- Transport belt (positions: -46.5, 74.5, -45.5, 74.5, -45.5, 73.5) connecting to furnace - contains 8 copper ore
- Stone furnace (position: -43.0, 73.0) - fueled with coal and working, currently smelting copper ore
- Burner inserter for input (position: -44.5, 73.5) - working
- Burner inserter for output (position: -41.5, 73.5) - working
- Wooden chest for copper plates (position: -40.5, 73.5) - contains 58 copper plates
- Burner inserter to move copper plates to belt (position: -39.5, 73.5) - output blocked, waiting for space
- Transport belt connecting to copper cable assembler - contains 17 copper plates
- Currently producing 19 copper plates per minute

### Copper Cable Production at Position(-34.5, 73.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 (position: -34.5, 73.5) with copper cable recipe - not receiving electricity, missing copper plate ingredients
- Burner inserter for output (position: -31.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Wooden chest for copper cables (position: -30.5, 73.5) - currently empty
- Burner inserter to move copper cables to belt (position: -29.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Transport belt connecting to circuit assembler

### Electronic Circuit Production at Position(-19.5, 60.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 (position: -19.5, 60.5) with electronic circuit recipe - not receiving electricity, missing iron plate and copper cable ingredients
- Burner inserter for iron plate input
